name: Swipe Bricks Breaking
description:
Blasting Fun with Swipe Brick Breaking!
Watch how time flies with the latest version of Brick Breaker, the one loved by 10 million users around the world.

[How to Play Swipe Brick Breaking]
- Swipe the ball and hit the brick
- The brick breaks when durability drops to 0
- If any brick come all the way to the bottom, you lose.

[The Specifics of Swipe Brick Breaking]
- Brick Breaker became much cooler with various bombs and balls
- Easy with only one hand! Swipe Brick Breaking
- Various stages and play modes
- And everything is free
- And everything is playable offline.
